<main class="l-page__main">
<a id="main-content" tabindex="-1"></a>
<div class="l-page__content">
<div class="block block-system block-system-main-block" id="block-mainpagecontent">
<div class="l-main">
<div>
<div class="l-main__content">
<div class="hero-profile-wrap">
<div class="l-container">
<div class="hero-profile">
<div class="hero-profile__info">
<div class="hero-profile__tags">
<p class="hero-profile__tag">          #1
        Heavyweight Division
  </p>
<p class="hero-profile__tag">#11 PFP</p>
<p class="hero-profile__tag">Active</p>
<p class="hero-profile__tag">Interim Title Holder</p>
</div>
<h1 class="hero-profile__name">Tom Aspinall</h1>
<div class="hero-profile__division">
<p class="hero-profile__division-title">Heavyweight Division</p>
<p class="hero-profile__division-body">15-3-0 (W-L-D)</p>
</div>
<div class="hero-profile__stats">
<div class="hero-profile__stat">
<p class="hero-profile__stat-numb">12</p>
<p class="hero-profile__stat-text">Wins by Knockout</p>
</div>
<div class="hero-profile__stat">
<p class="hero-profile__stat-numb">3</p>
<p class="hero-profile__stat-text">Wins by Submission</p>
</div>
<div class="hero-profile__stat">
<p class="hero-profile__stat-numb">14</p>
<p class="hero-profile__stat-text">First Round Finishes</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="hero-profile__image-wrap">
<img alt="Tom Aspinall" class="hero-profile__image" src="https://ufc.com/images/styles/athlete_bio_full_body/s3/2025-01/5/ASPINALL_TOM_BELT_L_07-27.png?itok=GKLL6fSZ"/>
</div>
<div class="hero-profile__fight">
<div class="hero-profile__fight__inner">
<div class="view view-athlete-results view-id-athlete_results view-display-id-last_fight js-view-dom-id-fdde54734f64c33c9c310783e53fd79c2906a0ee9aeff805e44278c35fde6379">
<div class="view-content">
<section class="l-listing--stacked">
<ul class="l-listing__group"><li class="l-listing__item">
<article class="c-card-event--athlete-fight c-card-event--past">
<div class="c-card-event--athlete-fight__header">
<p>Last fight</p>
<div class="c-card-event--athlete-fight__logo">

<div class="c-card__headline">
<h3 class="e-t3" id="n-143654">
<span>Important Heavyweight Stretch Starting In New York City</span>
</h3>
</div>
</div>
</a>
</div>
<div class="c-carousel__item">
<a class="c-card c-card--advance c-card--small" data-locale="en" data-modal-callback="/ajax/modal/node/141071" data-video-meta-id="671827" data-video-meta-type="vod" href="/video/141071">
<div class="c-card__media">
<i class="video-lock-icon"></i>
<div class="layout layout--onecol">
<div class="layout__region layout__region--content">
<picture>
<source height="356" media="(min-width: 1024px)" srcset="https://ufc.com/images/styles/card_advance_small_280x356/s3/2024-07/072724-Tom-Aspinall-Post-Fight-Press-Conference-UFC-304.jpg?itok=A9CGSohk 1x" type="image/jpeg" width="280"/>

<div class="l-container stats-record-wrap" id="athlete-stats">
<div class="l-container__content">
<div class="c-carousel-wrapper c-carousel--multiple">
<div class="l-listing__header stats-records__header carousel-section-title-wrap carousel-section-title-wrap--multiple">
<h2 class="l-listing__title stats-records__title">Stats &amp; Records</h2>
</div>
<div class="c-carousel--multiple__content carousel__multiple-items stats-records-inner-wrap" data-carousel="athlete">
<div class="stats-records stats-records__container stats-records--one-column">
<div class="stats-records-inner">
<div class="athlete-stats">
<div class="athlete-stats__stat">
<p class="athlete-stats__text athlete-stats__stat-numb">12</p>
<p class="athlete-stats__text athlete-stats__stat-text">Wins by Knockout</p>
</div>
<div class="athlete-stats__stat">
<p class="athlete-stats__text athlete-stats__stat-numb">3</p>
<p class="athlete-stats__text athlete-stats__stat-text">Wins by Submission</p>
</div>
<div class="athlete-stats__stat">
<p class="athlete-stats__text athlete-stats__stat-numb">14</p>
<p class="athlete-stats__text athlete-stats__stat-text">First Round Finishes</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="stats-records stats-records--two-column">
<div class="stats-records-inner">
<div class="tooltip">
<button aria-describedby="tooltip-419553267" class="tooltip__button" type="button">
<svg aria-hidden="true" fill="none" height="20" width="20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M9 7h2V5H9v2Zm1 11c-4.41 0-8-3.59-8-8s3.59-8 8-8 8 3.59 8 8-3.59 8-8 8Zm0-18a10 10 0 1 0 0 20 10 10 0 0 0 0-20ZM9 15h2V9H9v6Z" fill="#D20A0A"></path></svg>
</button>
<div class="tooltip__content-wrap tooltip__content-wrap--top-right" id="tooltip-419553267" role="tooltip"><div class="tooltip__content tooltip__content--top-right">Significant Strikes include all strikes at distance, plus power strikes in the clinch and on the ground.</div></div>
</div>
<div class="overlap-athlete-content overlap-athlete-content--horizontal">
<div class="c-overlap__chart">
<div class="e-chart-circle__wrapper">
<svg class="e-chart-circle" height="200" viewbox="-14 -14 128 128" width="200" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
<title>Striking accuracy 67%</title>
<circle class="e-chart-circle--athlete-stat__background" cx="50" cy="50" fill="none" r="50" stroke="#fefefe" stroke-width="26"></circle>
<circle class="e-chart-circle__circle" cx="50" cy="50" fill="none" r="50" stroke="#d20a0a" stroke-dasharray="314.2, 314.2" stroke-dashoffset="102.83766" stroke-width="26" transform="rotate(-90 50 50)"></circle>
<text class="e-chart-circle__percent" font-size="30" text-anchor="middle" x="50" y="60">67%</text>
</svg>
</div>
</div>
<div class="c-overlap__inner">
<div class="c-overlap--stats__title">
<h2 class="e-t3">Striking accuracy</h2>
</div>
<div class="c-overlap__stats-wrap">
<dl class="c-overlap__stats">
<dt class="c-overlap__stats-text">Sig. Strikes Landed</dt>
<dd class="c-overlap__stats-value">148</dd>
</dl>
<dl class="c-overlap__stats">
<dt class="c-overlap__stats-text">Sig. Strikes Attempted</dt>
<dd class="c-overlap__stats-value">220</dd>
</dl>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="stats-records stats-records--two-column">
<div class="stats-records-inner">
<div class="tooltip">
<button aria-describedby="tooltip-865076105" class="tooltip__button" type="button">
<svg aria-hidden="true" fill="none" height="20" width="20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M9 7h2V5H9v2Zm1 11c-4.41 0-8-3.59-8-8s3.59-8 8-8 8 3.59 8 8-3.59 8-8 8Zm0-18a10 10 0 1 0 0 20 10 10 0 0 0 0-20ZM9 15h2V9H9v6Z" fill="#D20A0A"></path></svg>
</button>
<div class="tooltip__content-wrap tooltip__content-wrap--top-right" id="tooltip-865076105" role="tooltip"><div class="tooltip__content tooltip__content--top-right">A takedown is awarded when a fighter deliberately grapples an opponent to the ground and establishes an advantageous position for an appreciable amount of time.</div></div>
</div>
<div class="overlap-athlete-content overlap-athlete-content--horizontal">
<div class="c-overlap__chart">
<div class="e-chart-circle__wrapper">
<svg class="e-chart-circle" height="200" viewbox="-14 -14 128 128" width="200" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
<title>Takedown Accuracy 100%</title>
<circle class="e-chart-circle--athlete-stat__background" cx="50" cy="50" fill="none" r="50" stroke="#fefefe" stroke-width="26"></circle>
<circle class="e-chart-circle__circle" cx="50" cy="50" fill="none" r="50" stroke="#d20a0a" stroke-dasharray="314.2, 314.2" stroke-dashoffset="0" stroke-width="26" transform="rotate(-90 50 50)"></circle>
<text class="e-chart-circle__percent" font-size="30" text-anchor="middle" x="50" y="60">100%</text>
</svg>
</div>
</div>
<div class="c-overlap__inner">
<div class="c-overlap--stats__title">
<h2 class="e-t3">Takedown Accuracy</h2>
</div>
<div class="c-overlap__stats-wrap">
<dl class="c-overlap__stats">
<dt class="c-overlap__stats-text">Takedowns Landed</dt>
<dd class="c-overlap__stats-value">2</dd>
</dl>
<dl class="c-overlap__stats">
<dt class="c-overlap__stats-text">Takedowns Attempted</dt>
<dd class="c-overlap__stats-value">4</dd>
</dl>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="stats-records stats-records--two-column">
<div class="stats-records--compare stats-records-inner">
<div class="c-stat-compare c-stat-compare--no-bar">
<div class="c-stat-compare__group c-stat-compare__group-1">
<div class="c-stat-compare__number">8.07
              </div>
<div class="c-stat-compare__label">Sig. Str. Landed</div>
<div class="c-stat-compare__label-suffix">Per Min</div>
</div>
<div class="c-stat-compare__group c-stat-compare__group-2">
<div class="c-stat-compare__number">2.89
          </div>
<div class="c-stat-compare__label">Sig. Str. Absorbed</div>
<div class="c-stat-compare__label-suffix">Per Min</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="c-stat-compare c-stat-compare--no-bar">
<div class="c-stat-compare__group c-stat-compare__group-1">
<div class="c-stat-compare__number">3.27
              </div>
<div class="c-stat-compare__label">Takedown avg</div>
<div class="c-stat-compare__label-suffix">Per 15 Min</div>
</div>
<div class="c-stat-compare__group c-stat-compare__group-2">
<div class="c-stat-compare__number">1.63
          </div>
<div class="c-stat-compare__label">Submission avg</div>
<div class="c-stat-compare__label-suffix">Per 15 Min</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="stats-records stats-records--two-column">
<div class="stats-records--compare stats-records-inner">
<div class="tooltip">
<button aria-describedby="tooltip-1904821616" class="tooltip__button" type="button">
<svg aria-hidden="true" fill="none" height="20" width="20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M9 7h2V5H9v2Zm1 11c-4.41 0-8-3.59-8-8s3.59-8 8-8 8 3.59 8 8-3.59 8-8 8Zm0-18a10 10 0 1 0 0 20 10 10 0 0 0 0-20ZM9 15h2V9H9v6Z" fill="#D20A0A"></path></svg>
</button>
<div class="tooltip__content-wrap tooltip__content-wrap--top-right" id="tooltip-1904821616" role="tooltip"><div class="tooltip__content tooltip__content--top-right"> <ul>
<li>Sig. Str. Defense is the percentage of significant strikes attempted against a fighter that do not land.</li>
<li>Takedown defense is the percentage of takedowns attempted against a fighter that do not land.</li>
<li>Knockdown Avg. is the average number of knockdowns per 15 Minutes window.</li>
</ul>
</div></div>
</div>
<div class="c-stat-compare c-stat-compare--no-bar">
<div class="c-stat-compare__group c-stat-compare__group-1">
<div class="c-stat-compare__number">65
                  <div class="c-stat-compare__percent">%</div></div>
<div class="c-stat-compare__label">Sig. Str. Defense</div>
</div>
<div class="c-stat-compare__group c-stat-compare__group-2">
<div class="c-stat-compare__number">100
                      <div class="c-stat-compare__percent">%</div></div>
<div class="c-stat-compare__label">Takedown Defense</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="c-stat-compare c-stat-compare--no-bar">
<div class="c-stat-compare__group c-stat-compare__group-1">
<div class="c-stat-compare__number">4.09
              </div>
<div class="c-stat-compare__label">Knockdown Avg</div>
</div>
<div class="c-stat-compare__group c-stat-compare__group-2">
<div class="c-stat-compare__number">02:02
          </div>
<div class="c-stat-compare__label">Average fight time</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="stats-records stats-records--three-column">
<div class="stats-records-inner">
<div class="c-stat-3bar c-stat-3bar--no-chart">
<h2 class="c-stat-3bar__title">Sig. Str. By Position</h2>
<div class="c-stat-3bar__legend">
<div class="c-stat-3bar__group">
<div class="c-stat-3bar__label">Standing </div>
<div class="c-stat-3bar__value">81 (55%)</div>
</div>
<div class="c-stat-3bar__group">

<div class="athlete-record" id="athlete-record">
<div class="l-container l-listing__title-wrap">
<div class="l-container__content">
<h2 class="l-listing__title">
                athlete record
              </h2>
</div>
</div>
<div class="l-container">
<div class="view view-eva view-athlete-results view-id-athlete_results view-display-id-entity_view_1 js-view-dom-id-b137007b3c97246c783c39c275b739847b122f0139e28e72d57fd76484e6f3fe">
<div class="views-infinite-scroll-content-wrapper clearfix" data-drupal-views-infinite-scroll-content-wrapper="">
<section class="l-listing--stacked">
<ul class="l-listing__group"><li class="l-listing__item">
<article class="c-card-event--athlete-results">
<div class="c-card-event--athlete-results__fight-container">
<div class="c-card-event--athlete-results__matchup-container">
<div class="c-card-event--athlete-results__matchup-wrapper">
<div class="c-card-event--athlete-results__matchup">
<div class="c-card-event--athlete-results__image c-card-event--athlete-results__red-image win">
<div class="c-card-event--athlete-results__plaque win">
                  Win
                </div>
<a href="https://www.ufc.com/athlete/tom-aspinall">

<div class="l-container--ufc-black faq-athlete">
<div class="l-container__content">
<div class="faq-athlete__wrap">
<div>
<h2 class="athlete-title">Info</h2>
<div class="faq-athlete__teaser">
<div class="field field--name-qna-teaser field--type-text-long field--label-hidden field__item"><p>Learn more about Tom Aspinall's UFC history, fighter facts, and Q&amp;A below.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="faq-athlete__tabs">
<section aria-multiselectable="false" class="c-tabs c-tabs--athlete">
<ul class="c-tabs__nav c-tabs__nav--n-4" role="tablist">
<li class="c-tabs__nav-item is-active" role="presentation">
<button aria-controls="tab-panel-1" aria-posinset="1" aria-selected="1" aria-setsize="3" class="btn c-tabs__nav-btn" role="tab" tabindex="">
          Bio
        </button>
</li>
<li class="c-tabs__nav-item" role="presentation">
<button aria-controls="tab-panel-2" aria-posinset="2" aria-selected="" aria-setsize="3" class="btn c-tabs__nav-btn" role="tab" tabindex="-1">
          Fighter Facts
        </button>
</li>
<li class="c-tabs__nav-item" role="presentation">
<button aria-controls="tab-panel-3" aria-posinset="3" aria-selected="" aria-setsize="3" class="btn c-tabs__nav-btn" role="tab" tabindex="-1">
          UFC History
        </button>
</li>
<li class="c-tabs__nav-item" role="presentation">
<button aria-controls="tab-panel-4" aria-posinset="4" aria-selected="" aria-setsize="3" class="btn c-tabs__nav-btn" role="tab" tabindex="-1">
          Q&amp;A
        </button>
</li>
</ul>
<div class="c-tabs__mobile-nav">
<label for="tab-666707409">
          Choose tab:
        </label>
<select class="c-tabs__select" id="tab-666707409">
<option value="tab-label-1">Bio</option>
<option value="tab-label-2">Fighter Facts</option>
<option value="tab-label-3">UFC History</option>
<option value="tab-label-4">Q&amp;A</option>
</select>
</div>
<div class="c-tabs__panes">
<div aria-labelledby="tab-label-1" class="c-tabs__pane is-current" id="tab-panel-1" role="tabpanel" tabindex="-1">
<div class="c-tabs__pane-body">
<div class="c-bio c-bio--athlete">
<div class="c-bio__content">
<div class="c-bio__info">
<div class="c-bio__info-details">
<div class="c-bio__row--1col">
<div class="c-bio__field">
<div class="c-bio__label">Status</div>
<div class="c-bio__text">Active</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="c-bio__row--1col">
<div class="c-bio__field c-bio__field--border-bottom-small-screens">
<div class="c-bio__label">Place of Birth</div>
<div class="c-bio__text">Salford, England</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="c-bio__row--2col">
<div class="c-bio__field c-bio__field--border-bottom-small-screens">
<div class="c-bio__label">Trains at</div>
<div class="c-bio__text">Team Kaobon</div>
</div>
<div class="c-bio__field c-bio__field--border-bottom-small-screens">
<div class="c-bio__label">Fighting style</div>
<div class="c-bio__text">Freestyle</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="c-bio__row--3col">
<div class="c-bio__field">
<div class="c-bio__label">Age</div>
<div class="c-bio__text">
<div class="field field--name-age field--type-integer field--label-hidden field__item">32</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="c-bio__field">
<div class="c-bio__label">Height</div>
<div class="c-bio__text">77.00</div>
</div>
<div class="c-bio__field">
<div class="c-bio__label">Weight</div>
<div class="c-bio__text">255.00</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="c-bio__row--3col">
<div class="c-bio__field">
<div class="c-bio__label">Octagon Debut</div>
<div class="c-bio__text">Mar. 21, 2020</div>
</div>
<div class="c-bio__field">
<div class="c-bio__label">Reach</div>
<div class="c-bio__text">78.00</div>
</div>
<div class="c-bio__field">
<div class="c-bio__label">Leg reach</div>
<div class="c-bio__text">44.00</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div aria-labelledby="tab-label-2" class="c-tabs__pane" id="tab-panel-2" role="tabpanel" tabindex="-1">
<div class="c-tabs__pane-body">
<div class="field field--name-qna-facts field--type-text-long field--label-hidden field__item"><ul>
<li>Pro since 2014<br/> </li>
<li>Has won 10 of his last 11 <br/> </li>
<li>11 wins by KO, three by submission (Heel hook, RNC, armbar)<br/> </li>
<li>Has finished all wins, 13 in the first round<br/> </li>
<li>11 wins in 1:35 or less<br/> </li>
<li>Five wins in under a minute (shortest win – nine seconds)<br/> </li>
<li>Reported 6-0 amateur record</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div aria-labelledby="tab-label-3" class="c-tabs__pane" id="tab-panel-3" role="tabpanel" tabindex="-1">
<div class="c-tabs__pane-body">
<div class="field field--name-qna-ufc field--type-text-long field--label-hidden field__item"><p><strong>UFC 304</strong> (7/27/24) Aspinall stopped Curtis Blaydes via strikes at 1:00 of the first round to retain his UFC interim heavyweight title</p>
<p><strong>UFC 295</strong> (11/11/23) Aspinall stopped Sergei Pavlovich via strikes at 1:09 of the first round to win the UFC interim heavyweight title </p>
<p><strong>UFC Fight Night</strong> (7/22/23) Aspinall stopped Marcin Tybura via strikes at 1:13 of the first round </p>
<p><strong>UFC Fight Night</strong> (7/23/22) Aspinall lost via TKO (injury) to Curtis Blaydes at :15 of the first round</p>
<p><strong>UFC Fight Night</strong> (3/19/22) Aspinall submitted Alexander Volkov via armbar at 3:45 of the first round</p>
<p><strong>UFC Fight Night</strong> (9/4/21) Aspinall stopped Serghei Spivac via strikes at 2:30 of the first round</p>
<p><strong>UFC Fight Night</strong> (2/20/21) Aspinall submitted Andrei Arlovski via rear naked choke at 1:09 of the second round</p>
<p><strong>UFC Fight Night</strong> (10/10/20) Aspinall stopped Alan Baudot via strikes at 1:35 of the first round</p>
<p><strong>UFC on ESPN</strong> (7/25/20) Aspinall stopped Jake Collier via strikes at :45 of the first round</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div aria-labelledby="tab-label-4" class="c-tabs__pane" id="tab-panel-4" role="tabpanel" tabindex="-1">
<div class="c-tabs__pane-body">
<div class="field field--name-qna field--type-text-long field--label-hidden field__item"><p><strong>When and why did you start training for fighting?</strong> I got into it through my father. I started seriously training in my early teens.<strong> </strong><br/><br/><strong>What ranks and titles have you held?</strong> Two-time<strong> </strong>British amateur champ<br/><br/><strong>Do you have any heroes?</strong> Naseem Hamed<strong> </strong><br/><br/><strong>What does it mean for you to fight in the UFC?</strong> It means I get to test myself against the best in the world.<br/><br/><strong>Did you go to college and if so what degree did you earn?</strong> Personal training qualifications<strong> </strong><br/><br/><strong>What was your job before you started fighting?</strong> Personal trainer<strong> </strong><br/><br/><strong>Ranks in any martial arts styles:</strong> Black belt in BJJ<br/><br/><strong>Favorite grappling technique:</strong> Armbar<br/><br/><strong>Favorite Striking technique:</strong> Flying knee</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<a class="c-menu-footer__link--level-2" href="https://www.tiktok.com/@ufc">TikTok</a>
</li>
<li class="c-menu-footer__item--level-2">
<a class="c-menu-footer__link--level-2" href="https://twitter.com/ufc">Twitter</a>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li class="c-menu-footer__item--level-1">
<a class="c-menu-footer__link--level-1" data-drupal-link-system-path="node/90551" href="/faq" target="_self">Help</a>

<div class="l-page">
<span class="l-page__header-pin" id="header-pin"></span>
<div class="l-page__header" id="header-wrapper">
<header class="c-site-header" data-header-state="animate">
<div class="c-site-header__content">

<main class="l-page__main">
<a id="main-content" tabindex="-1"></a>
<div class="l-page__content">
<div class="block block-system block-system-main-block" id="block-mainpagecontent">
<div class="l-main">
<div>
<div class="l-main__content">
<div class="hero-profile-wrap">
<div class="l-container">
<div class="hero-profile">
<div class="hero-profile__info">
<div class="hero-profile__tags">
<p class="hero-profile__tag">          #1
        Heavyweight Division
  </p>
<p class="hero-profile__tag">#11 PFP</p>
<p class="hero-profile__tag">Active</p>
<p class="hero-profile__tag">Interim Title Holder</p>
</div>
<h1 class="hero-profile__name">Tom Aspinall</h1>
<div class="hero-profile__division">
<p class="hero-profile__division-title">Heavyweight Division</p>
<p class="hero-profile__division-body">15-3-0 (W-L-D)</p>
</div>
<div class="hero-profile__stats">
<div class="hero-profile__stat">
<p class="hero-profile__stat-numb">12</p>
<p class="hero-profile__stat-text">Wins by Knockout</p>
</div>
<div class="hero-profile__stat">
<p class="hero-profile__stat-numb">3</p>
<p class="hero-profile__stat-text">Wins by Submission</p>
</div>
<div class="hero-profile__stat">
<p class="hero-profile__stat-numb">14</p>
<p class="hero-profile__stat-text">First Round Finishes</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="hero-profile__image-wrap">
<img alt="Tom Aspinall" class="hero-profile__image" src="https://ufc.com/images/styles/athlete_bio_full_body/s3/2025-01/5/ASPINALL_TOM_BELT_L_07-27.png?itok=GKLL6fSZ"/>
</div>
<div class="hero-profile__fight">
<div class="hero-profile__fight__inner">
<div class="view view-athlete-results view-id-athlete_results view-display-id-last_fight js-view-dom-id-fdde54734f64c33c9c310783e53fd79c2906a0ee9aeff805e44278c35fde6379">
<div class="view-content">
<section class="l-listing--stacked">
<ul class="l-listing__group"><li class="l-listing__item">
<article class="c-card-event--athlete-fight c-card-event--past">
<div class="c-card-event--athlete-fight__header">
<p>Last fight</p>
<div class="c-card-event--athlete-fight__logo">
<div class="svg-793b48dc2eb2d7d2b6f0faef3debbe68 e-event-logo--light"><?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><!-- Generator: Adobe Illustrator 28.3.0, SVG Export Plug-In . <div class="c-card-event--athlete-fight__info">
<h3 class="c-card-event--athlete-fight__headline">
                      Aspinall <span>vs</span> Blaydes
                    </h3>
<div class="c-card-event--athlete-fight__date">Jul. 27, 2024</div>
</div>

<div class="l-container__content">
<div class="view view-eva view-athlete-articles view-id-athlete_articles view-display-id-entity_view_1 js-view-dom-id-7e86769df9ca3ff9ba765e683337ff699e25ad57ce4c87710622413ca6eb26ed">
<div class="c-carousel-wrapper c-carousel--multiple">
<div class="carousel-section-title-wrap carousel-section-title-wrap--multiple">
<h2 class="c-carousel__title--multiple">UFC Spotlight</h2>
</div>
<div class="c-carousel--multiple__content carousel__multiple-items" data-carousel="multiple-items">
<div class="c-carousel__item">
<a class="c-card c-card--advance c-card--small" data-locale="en" data-modal-callback="/ajax/modal/node/144591" data-video-meta-id="734421" data-video-meta-type="vod" href="/video/144591">
<div class="c-card__media">
<i class="video-lock-icon"></i>
<div class="layout layout--onecol">
<div class="layout__region layout__region--content">
<picture>
<source height="356" media="(min-width: 1024px)" srcset="https://ufc.com/images/styles/card_advance_small_280x356/s3/2024-12/122024-UFC-Connected-Full-Episode-Thumbnail.jpg?itok=eLO0jM6b 1x" type="image/jpeg" width="280"/>

</picture>
</div>
</div>
<div class="c-card__icon-big">

</div>

<svg class="e-icon__svg"><title>Video</title><use xlink:href="/themes/custom/ufc/assets/svg/sprite-ui.svg#video" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"></use></svg>
<span class="e-p--small"></span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="c-card__allinfo">
<div class="c-card__headline">
<h3 class="e-t3">
            UFC Connected: Tom Aspinall, Michael ‘Venom’ Page, Jailton Almeida and Loma Lookboonme
          </h3>
</div>
</div>
</a>
</div>
<div class="c-carousel__item">
<a class="c-card c-card--advance c-card--small" data-locale="en" data-modal-callback="/ajax/modal/node/144528" data-video-meta-id="733526" data-video-meta-type="vod" href="/video/144528">

<div class="l-container stats-record-wrap" id="athlete-stats">
<div class="l-container__content">
<div class="c-carousel-wrapper c-carousel--multiple">
<div class="l-listing__header stats-records__header carousel-section-title-wrap carousel-section-title-wrap--multiple">
<h2 class="l-listing__title stats-records__title">Stats &amp; Records</h2>
</div>
<div class="c-carousel--multiple__content carousel__multiple-items stats-records-inner-wrap" data-carousel="athlete">
<div class="stats-records stats-records__container stats-records--one-column">
<div class="stats-records-inner">
<div class="athlete-stats">
<div class="athlete-stats__stat">
<p class="athlete-stats__text athlete-stats__stat-numb">12</p>
<p class="athlete-stats__text athlete-stats__stat-text">Wins by Knockout</p>
</div>
<div class="athlete-stats__stat">
<p class="athlete-stats__text athlete-stats__stat-numb">3</p>
<p class="athlete-stats__text athlete-stats__stat-text">Wins by Submission</p>
</div>
<div class="athlete-stats__stat">
<p class="athlete-stats__text athlete-stats__stat-numb">14</p>
<p class="athlete-stats__text athlete-stats__stat-text">First Round Finishes</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="stats-records stats-records--two-column">
<div class="stats-records-inner">
<div class="tooltip">
<button aria-describedby="tooltip-419553267" class="tooltip__button" type="button">
<svg aria-hidden="true" fill="none" height="20" width="20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M9 7h2V5H9v2Zm1 11c-4.41 0-8-3.59-8-8s3.59-8 8-8 8 3.59 8 8-3.59 8-8 8Zm0-18a10 10 0 1 0 0 20 10 10 0 0 0 0-20ZM9 15h2V9H9v6Z" fill="#D20A0A"></path></svg>
</button>
<div class="tooltip__content-wrap tooltip__content-wrap--top-right" id="tooltip-419553267" role="tooltip"><div class="tooltip__content tooltip__content--top-right">Significant Strikes include all strikes at distance, plus power strikes in the clinch and on the ground.</div></div>
</div>
<div class="overlap-athlete-content overlap-athlete-content--horizontal">
<div class="c-overlap__chart">
<div class="e-chart-circle__wrapper">
<svg class="e-chart-circle" height="200" viewbox="-14 -14 128 128" width="200" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

<div class="tooltip__content-wrap tooltip__content-wrap--top-right" id="tooltip-1904821616" role="tooltip"><div class="tooltip__content tooltip__content--top-right"> <ul>
<li>Sig. Str. Defense is the percentage of significant strikes attempted against a fighter that do not land.</li>
<li>Takedown defense is the percentage of takedowns attempted against a fighter that do not land.</li>
<li>Knockdown Avg. is the average number of knockdowns per 15 Minutes window.</li>
</ul>
</div></div>
</div>

			c0.1-0.24,0.17-0.5,0.19-0.8c-0.16-3.35-0.92-6.63-1.22-9.98c-0.4-4.38-0.15-8.61,1.09-12.81c0.41-1.38,0.66-2.8,1.21-4.6
			c1.14,2.46,2.1,4.59,2.37,6.96c0.82,7.43,2.39,14.68,5.81,21.45c0.69,1.37,1.15,2.88,0.82,4.36c-0.77,3.46-0.7,6.98-1.13,10.46
			c-0.05,0.36-0.15,0.71-0.31,1.03c-0.51,1.03-0.43,2.01,0.37,2.83c0.85,0.88,1.94,0.95,3.08,0.63c2.72-0.75,3.78-2.85,4.47-5.25
			v-1.44c-0.92-2.55-1.18-5.19-1.16-7.89c0.07-7.81,0.02-15.64-1.9-23.28c-1.54-6.1-3.41-12.13-4.53-18.33
			c-0.51-2.85-0.6-5.73-0.89-8.59c-0.11-1.02-0.31-2.01-0.56-3c-0.82-3.3-2.91-5.06-6.33-5.96c-1.32-0.35-2.56-0.88-3.74-1.5h-26.89
			C110.66,42.85,109.46,43.36,108.18,43.7z" fill="#D20A0A" id="e-stat-body_x5F__x5F_body" opacity="0.25428571428571"></path>
<g id="e-stat-body_x5F__x5F_leg">
<path d="M144.56,119.75H127.7c0.01,0.05,0.03,0.1,0.04,0.15

<div class="stats-records stats-records--three-column">

<div class="l-container--ufc-black faq-athlete">
<div class="l-container__content">
<div class="faq-athlete__wrap">
<div>
<h2 class="athlete-title">Info</h2>
<div class="faq-athlete__teaser">
<div class="field field--name-qna-teaser field--type-text-long field--label-hidden field__item"><p>Learn more about Tom Aspinall's UFC history, fighter facts, and Q&amp;A below.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="faq-athlete__tabs">
<section aria-multiselectable="false" class="c-tabs c-tabs--athlete">
<ul class="c-tabs__nav c-tabs__nav--n-4" role="tablist">
<li class="c-tabs__nav-item is-active" role="presentation">
<button aria-controls="tab-panel-1" aria-posinset="1" aria-selected="1" aria-setsize="3" class="btn c-tabs__nav-btn" role="tab" tabindex="">
          Bio
        </button>
</li>
<li class="c-tabs__nav-item" role="presentation">
<button aria-controls="tab-panel-2" aria-posinset="2" aria-selected="" aria-setsize="3" class="btn c-tabs__nav-btn" role="tab" tabindex="-1">
          Fighter Facts
        </button>
</li>
<li class="c-tabs__nav-item" role="presentation">
<button aria-controls="tab-panel-3" aria-posinset="3" aria-selected="" aria-setsize="3" class="btn c-tabs__nav-btn" role="tab" tabindex="-1">
          UFC History
        </button>
</li>
<li class="c-tabs__nav-item" role="presentation">
<button aria-controls="tab-panel-4" aria-posinset="4" aria-selected="" aria-setsize="3" class="btn c-tabs__nav-btn" role="tab" tabindex="-1">
          Q&amp;A
        </button>
</li>
</ul>
<div class="c-tabs__mobile-nav">
<label for="tab-666707409">
          Choose tab:
        </label>
<select class="c-tabs__select" id="tab-666707409">
<option value="tab-label-1">Bio</option>
<option value="tab-label-2">Fighter Facts</option>
<option value="tab-label-3">UFC History</option>

</select>
</div>
<div class="c-tabs__panes">
<div aria-labelledby="tab-label-1" class="c-tabs__pane is-current" id="tab-panel-1" role="tabpanel" tabindex="-1">
<div class="c-tabs__pane-body">
<div class="c-bio c-bio--athlete">
<div class="c-bio__content">
<div class="c-bio__info">
<div class="c-bio__info-details">
<div class="c-bio__row--1col">
<div class="c-bio__field">
<div class="c-bio__label">Status</div>
<div class="c-bio__text">Active</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="c-bio__row--1col">
<div class="c-bio__field c-bio__field--border-bottom-small-screens">
<div class="c-bio__label">Place of Birth</div>
<div class="c-bio__text">Salford, England</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="c-bio__row--2col">
<div class="c-bio__field c-bio__field--border-bottom-small-screens">
<div class="c-bio__label">Trains at</div>
<div class="c-bio__text">Team Kaobon</div>
</div>
<div class="c-bio__field c-bio__field--border-bottom-small-screens">
<div class="c-bio__label">Fighting style</div>
<div class="c-bio__text">Freestyle</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="c-bio__row--3col">
<div class="c-bio__field">
<div class="c-bio__label">Age</div>
<div class="c-bio__text">
<div class="field field--name-age field--type-integer field--label-hidden field__item">32</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="c-bio__field">
<div class="c-bio__label">Height</div>
<div class="c-bio__text">77.00</div>
</div>
<div class="c-bio__field">
<div class="c-bio__label">Weight</div>
<div class="c-bio__text">255.00</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="c-bio__row--3col">
<div class="c-bio__field">
<div class="c-bio__label">Octagon Debut</div>
<div class="c-bio__text">Mar. 21, 2020</div>
</div>
<div class="c-bio__field">
<div class="c-bio__label">Reach</div>
<div class="c-bio__text">78.00</div>
</div>
<div class="c-bio__field">
<div class="c-bio__label">Leg reach</div>
<div class="c-bio__text">44.00</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div aria-labelledby="tab-label-2" class="c-tabs__pane" id="tab-panel-2" role="tabpanel" tabindex="-1">
<div class="c-tabs__pane-body">
<div class="field field--name-qna-facts field--type-text-long field--label-hidden field__item"><ul>
<li>Pro since 2014<br/> </li>
<li>Has won 10 of his last 11 <br/> </li>
<li>11 wins by KO, three by submission (Heel hook, RNC, armbar)<br/> </li>
<li>Has finished all wins, 13 in the first round<br/> </li>
<li>11 wins in 1:35 or less<br/> </li>
<li>Five wins in under a minute (shortest win – nine seconds)<br/> </li>
<li>Reported 6-0 amateur record</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div aria-labelledby="tab-label-3" class="c-tabs__pane" id="tab-panel-3" role="tabpanel" tabindex="-1">
<div class="c-tabs__pane-body">
<div class="field field--name-qna-ufc field--type-text-long field--label-hidden field__item"><p><strong>UFC 304</strong> (7/27/24) Aspinall stopped Curtis Blaydes via strikes at 1:00 of the first round to retain his UFC interim heavyweight title</p>
<p><strong>UFC 295</strong> (11/11/23) Aspinall stopped Sergei Pavlovich via strikes at 1:09 of the first round to win the UFC interim heavyweight title </p>
<p><strong>UFC Fight Night</strong> (7/22/23) Aspinall stopped Marcin Tybura via strikes at 1:13 of the first round </p>
<p><strong>UFC Fight Night</strong> (7/23/22) Aspinall lost via TKO (injury) to Curtis Blaydes at :15 of the first round</p>
<p><strong>UFC Fight Night</strong> (3/19/22) Aspinall submitted Alexander Volkov via armbar at 3:45 of the first round</p>
<p><strong>UFC Fight Night</strong> (9/4/21) Aspinall stopped Serghei Spivac via strikes at 2:30 of the first round</p>
<p><strong>UFC Fight Night</strong> (2/20/21) Aspinall submitted Andrei Arlovski via rear naked choke at 1:09 of the second round</p>
<p><strong>UFC Fight Night</strong> (10/10/20) Aspinall stopped Alan Baudot via strikes at 1:35 of the first round</p>
<p><strong>UFC on ESPN</strong> (7/25/20) Aspinall stopped Jake Collier via strikes at :45 of the first round</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div aria-labelledby="tab-label-4" class="c-tabs__pane" id="tab-panel-4" role="tabpanel" tabindex="-1">
<div class="c-tabs__pane-body">
<div class="field field--name-qna field--type-text-long field--label-hidden field__item"><p><strong>When and why did you start training for fighting?</strong> I got into it through my father. I started seriously training in my early teens.<strong> </strong><br/><br/><strong>What ranks and titles have you held?</strong> Two-time<strong> </strong>British amateur champ<br/><br/><strong>Do you have any heroes?</strong> Naseem Hamed<strong> </strong><br/><br/><strong>What does it mean for you to fight in the UFC?</strong> It means I get to test myself against the best in the world.<br/><br/><strong>Did you go to college and if so what degree did you earn?</strong> Personal training qualifications<strong> </strong><br/><br/><strong>What was your job before you started fighting?</strong> Personal trainer<strong> </strong><br/><br/><strong>Ranks in any martial arts styles:</strong> Black belt in BJJ<br/><br/><strong>Favorite grappling technique:</strong> Armbar<br/><br/><strong>Favorite Striking technique:</strong> Flying knee</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="l-container--ufc-black">
